data.title: Good eating
data.text: My brother, his fiancée and I had a delightful dinner and we all enjoyed the food and the atmosphere.

data.title: Good Mexican Food
data.text: I eat here once a week, very close to my office.  They have good lunch specials and I like the fact that they offer 3 different sizes for your lunch entrees.  Fajitas are good and the tropical margarita is really good!  Staff friendly.

user_location.name: West Palm Beach, Florida, United States

data.title: I have been going to this restaurant for many years.
data.text: Love this place always great service and great food. When on this side of town and looking for good authentic Spanish food I stop in here! Lunch or Dinner! I have never had a bad meal and I've tried almost everything on their menu!

data.title: Still not good
data.text:
I waited 2 years before giving this restaurant another chance and I am sorry that I did.  I just happened to be very hungry while at this plaza but I should have driven somewhere else.

The person that seated us and took our drink our drink order was very friendly but our waiter was not friendly at all and exhibited the bare minimum in politeness.  He never checked to see how the food was or if we needed anything.

The food was just ok, very disappointed for Mexican food and it took long to arrive, people that arrived after us ate and left before we did even though they had ordered the same dishes.

When I got the check the waiter had charged adult prices on my kids' drinks.  It took a while to find him to bring it to his attention and when he "fixed" it he just deducted $0.80 with pen instead of actually correcting the check when the overcharge was $1.40.  Being an accountant, I tend to fight for accuracy to the penny but by then I was in a bad mood and desperate to leave so I paid the bill and deducted the difference from his tip instead.

I won't be coming back here anytime soon.

data.title: Great Tex-Mex!
data.text: Great Tex-Mex food here! I've been going here for years and have never had a bad meal. The portions are large and the prices are reasonable.  The staff is always friendly.

data.title: Went Once
data.text: Florida is not noted for good Mexican food. This place was ok food was acceptable but not authentic. Would not return to eat here

data.title: Family friendly, my grandsons really enjoyed the complimentary chips and salsa.
data.text: Friendly staff, large portions at a family friendly price. The Burritos an Fajitas are excellent! Definitely worth a visit if you have an urge for quality Mexican cuisine. The second Pueblo Viejo in Port St a Lucie on Peacock Blvd also serves quality dishes.

data.title: delicious
data.text:
we came in for dinner with our family,food was very good ,very friendly, clean ,excellent service
I highly recommend anything on the menu

data.title: chimichanga
data.text: Spanins and Mexican restaurant we eat there when we are really hungry .have a exelent Margarita and then the chicken or shredded meat chimichanga with rice and beans very delicious definitely recommend this dish

data.title: Good Value & Delicious
data.text:
People might think this a fast food Mexican restaurant but, I was pleasantly SURPRISED!  NO fan fare but, very comfortable, clean & delicious.  I was pleasantly surprised to have stumbled upon this little Mexican restaurant. 
Bon appetit :)

data.title: Great Food, Great Restaurant!
data.text: Great people, great food, you get a lot of food for you money here as well! We live around the corner and go there as often as we can. It a small local chain and it has a local restaurant feel to it! Love this place!

data.title: Great food, great service!
data.text: We live locally and this place is one of our regular favorites! The food is always exceptional. Great atmosphere!

data.title: For a Florida Mexican Place, not bad at all
data.text: The flavors are great, prices are very fair, I love the fact that they keep hot sauce and chips that are fresh at the table the whole time. The Peccadillo hot sauce is great. The only issues I have is cleanliness of floors and bathrooms, everything else was great.

data.title: good family restaurant
data.text: Good food w/ large portions, nicely decorated in Mexican style. 2 for 1 drinks, attentive service, reasonable prices. I'd go back. We didn't like the fish tacos, the fish didn't taste fresh.The Chimichangas and Burritos were delicious. The server made guacamole at the table, It was excellent! The place was crowded on a Saturday night but the service was fine.

data.title: chicken fajitas are great large portion.
data.text: Went for early dinner very good.  Good service.  Clean and cool.  The service was prompt. Will go again.

data.title: Great Mexican food
data.text: Great choice for family friendly my husband loves the 2 for 1 margaritas! Love the chips and salsa my favorite dish is "burrito azteca" it's a white sauce not spicy with grilled chicken and shrimp served with rice and refried beans!!

data.title: Pueblo Viejo - Authentic Mexican Fare and nice Cocktails too
data.text: New Menu Items to check out at Pueblo Vijo - the best Mexican fare in St Lucie West.  Great foood and service too!

data.title: Quick, decent food/drinks
data.text: Great service and a great go-to for a fun meal with kids or friends. Super fast service and 2 for 1 drink specials in house all day.

data.title: Been Going There For Years
data.text:
The Pueblo Viejo on PSL Blvd in the Winn Dixie plaza has been there for many years. They have expanded to 5 more locations. We have never had a bad meal at any of the locations we've been to. My husband picked up take out yesterday. The food was delicious as always, but I ordered a side of the white cheese dip. Each order comes with chips and salsa. We had a generous bag of chips, but the container of salsa was the smallest plastic container with a lid, maybe it would hold an ounce. The maybe 2 ounce container with the white cheese in it was less than half full and I paid 1.50 extra for it. I took pictures and headed in there today with the empty containers. They apologized and gave me not only a new bag of chips, but a larger container of salsa and an appetizer sized container of the cheese dip!!!!! Rather than go on social media and slam them I decided to see if they would make it right and they did. We've been eating here on and off since the day they opened and will continue to do so. 
I think some, maybe all have full bars.

data.title: Great salsa
data.text: Always a good meal.  Great salsa.  If you like the hot stuff, you have to ask for it.  Chips and meals always come out hot and fresh.
